text: Choose the faction you want to trade with :
Select at least one region to trade

Confederate the giving faction into the receiving faction.\\n[[col:red]]WARNING: This will cause all cities and armies of %s to be annexed by %s. Presing this button will cause %s to cease to exist![[/col]]
[[col:green]]You will receive a diplomatic bonus to %s for gifting your own city away.[[/col]]
